title: The Italian town that banned cricket
description: Nearly a third of Monfalcone's residents are foreign, and the mayor says the "cultural essence" of the town is in danger.
content:
Miah Bappy and other Bengalis have to play cricket outside the town of Monfalcone

author: Timothy Abraham
title: Anderson a target for USA's Major League Cricket
description: England's all-time leading Test wicket-taker James Anderson is a target for Major League Cricket in the USA, BBC Sport understands.
content:
England's all-time leading Test wicket-taker James Anderson is a surprise target for Major League Cricket.
